title: FS: 1943 RPPC Joe Dimaggio US Air Force SGC 20 with baseball content on back
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: 1943 RPPC Joe Dimaggio US Air Force SGC 20 with baseball content on back
posts.post_content:
For sale is the very cool 1943 RPPC of Joe Dimaggio playing in a game with the US Air Force. SGC 20, The back reads “Joltin Joe isn’t here now, but we have quite a lot of former big leaguers here”. 

$600 Delivered. An example without the baseball content just sold for $660 in the most recent Brockelman Auction. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=331300&d=1539562599[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=331301&d=1539562605[/IMG]
Bump. Price Price decrease to $600 delivered
